E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/6/1990
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Rosendo Daban



Date: Sunday, 2/16/1990
Subject: I'll sign elsewhere
Sorry, Ashburn has made the best overall offer.
I'll sign with them. Good luck this season!

Regards,
Rosendo Daban

Date: Saturday, 3/1/1990
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
C Joe Solano
in return for
SP Shawn Deckert, SP Ruben Gallardo.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1990
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Warner Cannaday

Subject: Progress of Luis Bethune

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
